nodes.text: The Dalonbian sector in the Tingel Arm of the Outer Rim Territories contained the Belkadan and Helska systems. The sector was adjacent to the Veragi, Chopani, Kanz, Mieru'kar, and Spinward sectors.

By the time of the Great Galactic War, the planets Belkadan and Sernpidal had governments which were secretly controlled by a secret Sith Empire. These governments turned on the Republic fleet in the Tingel Arm at the beginning of the war.

Millennia later, it was the location of Vector Prime, the coordinates at which the Yuuzhan Vong entered the galaxy during their incursions and invasion. By 137 ABY, the Coreward part of this sector was a part of Roan Fel's Empire-in-exile.

The Essential Atlas's appendix incorrectly places Artorias to the L-2 coordinates, while the maps of the Yuuzhan Vong War place the world to the K-3 grid coordinates. The first version of the Essential Atlas Online Companion still used the wrong coordinates that placed Artorias in the Dalonbian sector, but the later .pdf version corrected this and placed the planet in the Myto sector.
